content: learn to crochet this cute mini lemon amigurumi with this free and easy pattern including full video tutorial this cute easy design is perfect for beginners and can be completed within an hour use any yarn you like create a small keychain sized lemon with sport weight cotton yarn or make a larger plush version using super bulky chenille yarn the pattern includes a full video tutorial to guide you through making this adorable fruit amigurumi plushie keychain link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-lemon-crochet-pattern/ link to youtube video tutorial https //youtu be/kp_g9ctjb4q link to dutch/nederlands pattern https //www mariskavos nl/nl/gratis-citroen-knuffel-haakpatroon/ link to dutch/nederlands video https //youtu be/uscy8oxoo3u
